isis.stitle: TSI 01-16-06 - Door Adjustment on 4300 and 4400 Models

para.emph: If the rear edge of door gap to the cab b-pillar is not uniform:

step1.para: Loosen all four door hinge mounting bolts on the cab a-pillar.
Reposition the door gap to a uniform 4.5 mm (3/16 inch) gap.
Retighten the bolts to 19.6 to 24.0 Nm (15 to 18 lbf-ft).

para.emph: If the rear edge of the door is not flush with the cab b-pillar:

step1.para: Loosen the two striker mounting bolts just enough to allow striker movement with light pressure but will still hold in position.
Close and apply pressure to the door to make the door flush.
Release the door latch while still holding pressure against the door. Open the door and hand tighten the striker mounting bolts.
Re-close the door to check the door for being flush with the cab side panel at b-pillar. If flush, and door closes properly, retighten the bolts to 26 to 32 Nm (19 to 24 lbf-ft).
